Description:
WARNING: Applying this policy to Devices will cause a reboot between Device and User ESP phases!
NOTE: These features are automatically enabled on a fresh Win11 22H2 or above install, however they require Windows Enterprise to function correctly. They also require hardware support: 
https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/windows-hardware/design/device-experiences/oem-vbs
Name: Win - CDW Baseline - SC - Device Security - U - Device Guard, Credential Guard and HVCI - v3.7
